mapper.select: SELECT time, COUNT(behavior_type) behaviornum, SUM(CASE WHEN behavior_type='pv' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS hits, SUM(CASE WHEN behavior_type='fav' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS collectiontimes, SUM(CASE WHEN behavior_type='cart' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS additionalnum, SUM(CASE WHEN behavior_type='buy' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS buytimes FROM userbehavior GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;

select Date,COUNT(Behavior_type) as userbehaviornum, sum(case when Behavior_type ='pv' then 1 else 0 end ) as click, sum(case when Behavior_type ='fav' then 1 else 0 end) as collection, sum(case when Behavior_type ='cart' then 1 else 0 end) as additionalbuy, sum(case when Behavior_type ='buy' then 1 else 0 end) as buy from userbehavior GROUP BY Date ORDER BY Date;
SELECT item_id item,count(behavior_type) purchasevolume FROM userbehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'pv' GROUP BY item_id ORDER BY 购买量 desc LIMIT 20;
SELECT item_id 商品,count(behavior_type) purchasevolume FROM userbehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'buy' GROUP BY item_category ORDER BY 购买量 desc LIMIT 20;
